name: gestion-comptes
description: Application de gestion des comptes personnels

scripts.dev: npm run db:init && concurrently -n API,FRONT -c blue,green "npm run api" "npm run front"
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:api && npm run install:front
scripts.install:api: cd backend && python -m venv venv && node -e "const p=require('os').platform()==='win32'?'venv/Scripts/pip':'venv/bin/pip';require('child_process').execSync(p+' install -r requirements.txt',{stdio:'inherit'})"
